item.title: Monitoring & Control: Assumptions
item.description: Assumptions Record, maintain, review and validate your project's assumptions. Validate your Assumptions Record all key assumptions. Assign assumptions to specific owners. Confirm assumptions using review and validation dates. Free Trial » Search Assumptions Use Assumption Management's customisable search feature to easily locate specific assumptions. Free Trial » Import Assumptions Save time by importing known assumption from similar projects. Free Trial »
